name: pandemix.service
description: This service could potentially save the world !

scripts.restart: git pull && npm i && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npx -p @babel/cli -p @babel/core babel --copy-files ./src --out-dir dist/src && cp index.js dist/
scripts.deploy: npx pm2 kill && NODE_ENV=production npx pm2 start -i 2 dist/index.js
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.restart:quick: git pull && npm run clean:build && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.restart:full: git pull && npm i && npm run restart:quick
